description:
While helping run errands in town, Latina gets lost and goes on a small adventure of her own, while Dale frantically searches for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Musume, Aratana Seikatsu o Hajimeru.
La fillette entame une nouvelle vie
The Little Girl Begins Her New Life.
ちいさな娘, 新たな生活をはじめる.
